Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_get_preference

The function AIL_get_preference queries the current MSS internal parameters.

S32 AIL_get_preference(
  U32 name
);

In Parameters

name
specifies one of the MILES_PREFERENCES to query.

Returns

The current preference value.

Discussion

See the Preferences section for information on the meaning of various preference names and the effects their preference values have on the MSS system and drivers.


Group: Preferences, System Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_preference
Related Basic Types: MILES_PREFERENCES, S32, U32
